identification.source: MEI encoding: Kineya Rokuzaemon, Y. Nagai, K. Kobatake. "越後獅子", Echigo-Jishi, an electronic transcription. Encoded by Perry Roland. Musikwissenschaftliches Seminar, Detmold: Gartenstrasse 20, 32756 DetmoldGermany,

credit.credit-words: Source: "Japanese Popular Music: a collection of the popular music of Japan rendered in to the staff notation", by Y. Nagai and K. Kobatake, 2nd ed., Osaka, S. Miki & Co., 1892, pp. 96-97. Transcribed into Finale music notation by Tom Potter, 2005. See http://www.daisyfield.com/music/ Lyrics added by Karen Tanaka and Michael Good, 2006. See http://www.recordare.com/
Transcription donated to the public domain, 2005 by Tom Potter
